turnkey.title: TURNKEY SOLUTIONS
turnkey.description: Ready-made IP blocks and IC blueprints
turnkey.details: Leverage our portfolio of pre-verified, silicon-proven IP cores to accelerate your design cycle. Our turnkey solutions reduce risk and time-to-market for complex SoCs.

customization.title: CUSTOMIZATION
customization.description: Proven remedies adjusted to your application
customization.details: We adapt our robust, field-tested semiconductor solutions to meet your unique application requirements, ensuring optimal performance and seamless integration.

rd.title: R&D
rd.description: Unique keys based on years of experience
rd.details: Partner with us for cutting-edge Research and Development. Our experienced team pioneers novel solutions in digital, analog, and RF design to solve tomorrow's challenges.

mission.title: Mission
mission.text1: Sirius Semiconductors was established <1>to reach an ambitious target</1> to turn Vietnam into a technological powerhouse.
mission.text2: We are here <1>to provide expertise, technologies, service and products in microelectronics</1> for partners in a Vietnamese market and way beyond

icDesign.title: IC Design
icDesign.content:
We provide a full stack of Semiconductors Design & Programming
services for FPGAs, ASIC. Structures ASIC solutions for Digital,
Analogue, Radio Frequency (RF) & Photonic applications.

riscV.title: RISC-V core.
riscV.description: Open standard instruction set architecture with full dev toolkit and debug printed circuit

dma.title: DMA-controller.
dma.description: AMBA APB interface for control/ status register access and 2 AXI4 master interfaces

sram.title: SRAM.
sram.description: AXI4 to memory bridge with SECDEC and exclusive access support

gpio.title: GPIO with APB/AXI interface.
gpio.description: GPIO controller with AXI4/ APB interfaces

axi.title: AXI interconnect.
axi.description: System Interconnect with support of AXI3/ AXI4/ AHB/ APB interfaces

spi.title: SPI master interface.
spi.description: SPI master controller with AXI4 interface

i2c.title: I2C master interface.
i2c.description: I2C master controller with AXI4 interface

gpt.title: GPT.
gpt.description: General purpose timer with AXI4/ APB interfaces

analogPll.title: Analog PLL.
analogPll.description: PLL with frequency up to 5 GHz (TSMC 28 HPC+)

software.title: Software & Technologies
software.content:
Sirius also develops a stack of Microelectronics design
technologies, including Electronics Design Automation (EDA)
software which secures time-2-market & price-2-quality competitive advantages.
